title: Team Royal Facade needs analyzer of a decent rank!
body:
Hello OCE LoL gamers, 

I'm here on behalf of Team Royal Facade, a team which would hopefully start in a month. (casual, no serious stuff) We are all bronze players, willing to advance to a higher tier while having FUN. We are looking for enthusiastic analysts and maybe a coach who could review our games. The requirements are...

-Gold or around
-Of a mature age
-Have time to review our games
-Should be able to give feedback after a game or so.

Please reply if you wish to try out for the position, this job must be done for free. Remember, this job is for the people who want to become a coach/analyst without pay.

EDIT: The team name is now Team Royale Facade, 'Royal' was taken.
Also, why don't you guys try to make a icon for Team Royal Facade?

Thanks,
CarbonMini

replies.body: But most teams in OCE need volunteers because the scene is not professional enough yet. If they had more cash to splash into OPL events it would trickle down into the whole scene.
This is the most unprofessional attempt at a pitch. What a royal facade {{summoner:6}}

Remember, this is for FUN. No serious stuff. No OPL stuff. Just a casual team looking for analyzer. Why?
Because we want to be better.
